scripts.seed-movies: set DEBUG=app:* && set NODE_ENV=development && node utils/seeds/movies.js
scripts.seed-genres: set DEBUG=app:* && set NODE_ENV=development && node utils/seeds/genres.js
scripts.seed-users: set DEBUG=app:* && set NODE_ENV=development && node utils/seeds/users.js
scripts.seed-apiKeys: set DEBUG=app:* && set NODE_ENV=development && node utils/seeds/apiKeys.js
scripts.dev: SET DEBUG=app:* & SET NODE_ENV=development & nodemon index.js
